trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects that are the cells of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects for an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> control.

Controls can be added at the end of a collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection.Add%2A> method or at a specified index location in the collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
Only controls of type <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.HtmlTableCellControlCollection> collection.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object to the collection.
The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to add to the collection.
The added control must be of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object to the collection at the specified index location.
The added control can only be an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> control; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
The location in the array at which to add the child control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to add to the collection.
The added control must be of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref>.
